      • sender

        public <T> MessageProducer<T> sender(String address)
        Description copied from interface: EventBus
        Create a message sender against the specified address. The returned sender will invoke the EventBus.send(String, Object) method when the stream WriteStream.write(Object) method is called with the sender address and the provided data.
        Specified by:
        sender in interface EventBus
        Parameters:
        address - The address to send it to
        Returns:
        The sender

      • sender

                                     DeliveryOptions options)
        Description copied from interface: EventBus
        Create a message sender against the specified address. The returned sender will invoke the EventBus.send(String, Object, DeliveryOptions) method when the stream WriteStream.write(Object) method is called with the sender address, the provided data and the sender delivery options.
        Specified by:
        sender in interface EventBus
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The sender

      • consumer

        public <T> MessageConsumer<T> consumer(String address)
        Description copied from interface: EventBus
        Create a message consumer against the specified address. The returned consumer is not yet registered at the address, registration will be effective when MessageConsumer.handler(io.vertx.core.Handler) is called.
        Specified by:
        consumer in interface EventBus
        Parameters:
        address - The address that will register it at
        Returns:
        the event bus message consumer

      • localConsumer

        public <T> MessageConsumer<T> localConsumer(String address)
        Description copied from interface: EventBus
        Create a local message consumer against the specified address. The handler info won't be propagated across the cluster. The returned consumer is not yet registered at the address, registration will be effective when MessageConsumer.handler(io.vertx.core.Handler) is called.
        Specified by:
        localConsumer in interface EventBus
        Parameters:
        address - The address to register it at
        Returns:
        the event bus message consumer
